title: Developer Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, showcases my work, values, and technical skills through a clean, accessible, and high-performance design. It scores 90+ across all Lighthouse categories and reflects my focus on thoughtful development, usability, and attention to detail.
